::Battera::

She kept her back to him.  She lowered her hands and spoke in a slightly 
strained voice, "Vulois and Terminess. But I know that HellBeast surely must 
have killed them by now.  He is merciless.  He kills for the pleasure of 
killing."  She tooks a few steps forward.
"But I should never have left.  I should be dead with them instead of living 
as an honorless coward."
She started walking to the entrance again.
